examples.example: 这次会议让我们更加明确了未来的发展方向和目标。

translate.english: This meeting made us more clearly understand the future development direction and goals.

examples.example: 大家在会议上积极发言，为项目的成功出谋划策。

translate.english: Everyone actively spoke at the meeting and offered suggestions for the success of the project.

examples.example: 在这次重要的会议中，大家碰撞出了许多极具创意的火花。

translate.english: In this important meeting, everyone collided with many extremely creative sparks.
